Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct GalaChain gateway URLs and remove separate API_URL

- Update GALACHAIN_GATEWAY_URL to use correct endpoints:
  - Production: https://gateway-mainnet.galachain.com/api/asset/token-contract
  - Stage: https://gateway-testnet.galachain.com/api/testnet01/gc-a9b8b472b035c0510508c248d1110d3162b7e5f4-GalaChainToken
- Remove GALACHAIN_API_URL as all chaincode invocations go through the gateway
- Update configuration files \(server and client\) to use gatewayUrl directly
- Update galachainClient.ts to use gatewayUrl as the complete token contract URL
- Update all related tests to reflect the new URL structure

All 1197 tests pass \(1139 client + 58 server\).
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: read operations no longer require signing

- fetchBalances and fetchAllowances now make unsigned HTTP POST requests
  directly instead of going through TokenApi with BrowserConnectClient
- Read operations can now be performed without wallet connection
- Write operations \(transfer, mint, burn\) still require wallet signing

Changes:
- client/src/lib/galachainClient.ts: Add unsignedPost\(\) for read operations
- client/src/composables/useGalaChain.ts: getBalances/getAllowances require
  owner address but NOT wallet connection
- Updated useFungibleTokens, useNFTs, useCreatorCollections to pass address
- Updated all related tests to verify unsigned read behavior

All 1204 tests pass \(1146 client + 58 server\).
EOF
\)")
